Sadly is the Video_TS IFO fil caputt.Its works to watch the movie if you sorted out the video_ts 1-4 files and ex stream to a mod X-box,you can also watch these VTS-files on a PC.If you burn to a DVD-disc the movie stops in every chapterchange,just return to the previus chapter and then jump to next and it wil work.You have to do this in every chapterchange.I have tried to burn with IMGBurn and NERO not working in DVDplayer so something is corrupt with the IFOfile.
